description: This file defines a class named 'Token' representing entities within a macro expression, including their type (such as command, variable, value, comparison, group start/end) and value, with methods for retrieving properties and debugging.

classes.name: Token
classes.description: Represents a token within a macro expression, with properties indicating its type and value, and methods for classification and string representation.

methods.name: Token
methods.description: Constructor initializing the token with its type and value.

methods.name: getKind
methods.description: Returns the type of the token.

methods.name: getValue
methods.description: Returns the string value of the token.

methods.name: isComparison
methods.description: Indicates if the token is a comparison (default implementation returns false).

methods.name: isNegateComparison
methods.description: Indicates if the token is a negate comparison (default false).

methods.name: isOperator
methods.description: Indicates if the token is an operator (default false).

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Provides a debug string representing the token.
